mapper.select: SELECT product_barcode, product_name, product_type, product_trade_mark FROM ${db.schema}."Product" product INNER JOIN ${db.schema}."Type" type ON (product.product_type = type.type_id) WHERE type.category_id = #{productCategory};
SELECT type_caracteristic_id, product_caracteristic_value FROM ${db.schema}."ProductCaracteristic" WHERE product_barcode = #{productBarcode} ;
